    Marianne Trye, Peta Douglas

      • accuse

        public void accuse(Token player,
                   java.lang.String murderer,
                   java.lang.String murderWeapon,
                   java.lang.String crimeScene)
        Make a final accusation for who, how and where the victim was killed. If they are right, the player wins the game. If wrong, they lose.
        Parameters:
        player - The current Player
        murderer - Suspect they are accusing
        murderWeapon - Weapon they are accusing
        crimeScene - Location they are accusing

        Returns:
        List of the doors in the room
